info:
Music eater since 1985, music maker (unseriously) since 1989 or (seriously) since 1999. Freak of the good ol' amiga scene (octamed still rules, you fools) and working now with open mod plug tracker as teh best tracker in teh world, you still fool.
 Musically, Im listening to all styles. I never stop between those, but I'm mainly a metalhead. But I love ambiant, trance, hiphop, etc etc etc so I'm Teh artist, h√©!
 I make any style too, tho now i'm busy with underground metal releases, but that's very okay since i'm making still other 'free' music. You'll see, haha!
